scene.name: Intro
scene.line: Hello there.
My name is Dr. Paws. This is my assistant, Nurse Whiskers.
How do you do?
You're here because you're the best micro-biologist in the world.
Those poor kittens.
As you're probably aware, a new virus is affecting kittens around the world.
The kittens are turning into zombies.
And you're our only hope!
You're here to help us find the cure!
This is your first time here. Do you need a tutorial to figure out what to do?
Let's get started!

scene.name: Getting Started
scene.line: I knew you could do it!
Well done!
But now is not the time for celebration.
You've successfully created a vaccine to cure the first stages of Kitten Zombification.
But to completely eradicate the Kitten Zombification scourge, we must press on.
Time is of the essence!
Relax, Dr. Paws. I'm sure our new colleague can handle it.

scene.name: Well that was easy
scene.line: It seems you're getting the hang of it.
Wonderful job! You've extended the vaccine's reach to the second stage mutation!
At this rate, we'll have that cure in no time!
Not so fast!
What is it?
It's only going to get harder from here.
Don't be so negative, Doctor.
You can do it. I know you can.

scene.name: Microscope
scene.line: Well, you've done a good job up until now.
You've cured all the kittens with stage 3 zombification.
But we just don't have the equipment to handle stage 4.
It looks like we're finished.
Aw... That's so sad.
And I had just found this new tool for you to use.
You found it?
Sure did! Now you can use the Microscope.
Excellent. I was wrong. Our work can progress.
Do you want to see the tutorial on how to use it?
You can do this!

scene.name: Escalation
scene.line: Wait! What happened?
Something is very wrong.
I was afraid something like this would happen.
The virus is mutating too quickly. Stage 5 Zombification is now transmitted by touch.
We have to find a cure, and fast!
We're safe so long as we keep the specimens safely at bay.
Don't let them bite you.
Please be careful.

scene.name: Danger Zone
scene.line: That was a close one.
We have to be more careful than that.
Who knows what would happen to the world if you let yourself get turned.
It does not do to dwell on negative 'what if's.
We must stay focused on the task at hand.
Are you ready to dive back in?
Let's do this.

scene.name: Petri Dish
scene.line: Oh no! They're getting to complex.
There's no way to keep going
We've failed...
If you've taught me anything, Nurse, it's to never give up hope.
Also, to dig a little deeper into these filing cabinets.
I found these petri dishes. They'll let us splice up the virus into manageable chunks.
That's incredible!
Do you want to see the tutorial on how to use it?
We're almost there!

scene.name: Hitting The Fan
scene.line: They've escaped! They're all gone!
Lock the doors! Hurry!
They're breaking through!
Help me move this table.
There. Now they can't get in.
And we can't get out.
Our only chance is if you can find the cure before they get in.
Good luck!
We're done for.
What are you talking about?
And we were so close!
We're not through yet.
How are we possibly going to get through this?
The mutations just keep coming and coming.
We're near the end. We're almost there.
Can you do this?

scene.name: Victory
scene.line: You... you did it.
You've cured Kitty Zombification.
There's hope in the world again.
Thank you. Thank you so much.
I always knew you could do it.
